name: sociably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you enjoy spending time with other people and behaving in a friendly way towards them: She decided to spend less time in her room and to mix more sociably with the other residents. We sat around, sociably chatting to people around the campfire.
More examplesFewer examplesIn the student residence, you can live as privately or as sociably as you wish.We nodded sociably to other diners as we entered the restaurant.He very sociably invited us into his home to continue the discussion.
